messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] tapes
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/6/2004 1:27:27 PM Eastern Standard Time, tktraas@paulbunyan.net writes: Another thing that really helped me were tapes.  Her peaceful
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/6/2004 1:27:27 PM Eastern Standard Time,
tktraas@... writes:
Another thing that really helped me were tapes. Her peaceful parenting tape
is great. Also Anne O has some great parenting tapes that helped me to get
to a place where I could understand, feel comfortable and *live*
unschooling.

I think all of these resources can help a person get to that happy
unschooling place. Discussion lists, message boards, tapes, books, and
of course meeting these people, in person, at conferences. :)<<<<<


Thank you for the segue, Kelli! <G>

The tapes are in from the 2003 conference. Please go to the SOS website and
check out the Resource page. I'm ready to get them out of my dining room!

http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org/resources.html

We also have a few t-shirts left, but e-mail me first to see whether we have
your size in stock before you send $$ for it.

I apologize for the tardiness in getting them out. Personal problems----and
all my fault. But they're available now! So order away!

I'll need to post this everywhere, but y'all are the first to know!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] tapes
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/24/2002 11:26:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Srephanie, You can order any time. They re leaving tomorrow to be duplicated. You may send
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/24/2002 11:26:20 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Kelly...when will tapes be available to order? I have heard rav reviews
> about Anne O's
> talk and would love to get one...
>
> Stephanie E.
>
>

Srephanie, You can order any time. They're leaving tomorrow to be duplicated.
You may send me a check or hit our website and use PayPal.

Handbook $4 plus $1 shipping

Bumper Stickers $2

Unschoolers Live & Learn
SchoolsOutSupport.org


Tapes $6 plus $1 shipping (locals can pick them up at my house!)

"Learning, Yes, Schooling, No thank you" Ned Vare & Luz Shosie

"My Parents Trusted Me" Fiona Hutchison

"Unschooling As Mindful Living" Anne Ohman

"Unschooling Changes" Lisa Bugg

"Why You Can't Let Go" Joyce Fetteroll

www.SchoolsOutSupport.org

Kelly Lovejoy
118 Steeplechase South
Columbia, SC 29209-4810
